backend.peripheral

Class Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.peripheral.Device

  • public class Device
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to represent a peripheral device detected by PEMS.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Jacob Jones, Andrew Rottier

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.io.File file 
      private java.util.ArrayList<PeripheralFile> files 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Device(java.io.File file)
      Constructs an object representing an external device detected by this program.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<PeripheralFile> getFiles()
      Returns an ArrayList of PeripheralFile objects representing all of the potential evidence files detected on this device.
      private java.util.ArrayList<PeripheralFile> retrieveFiles(java.io.File directory, java.util.ArrayList<PeripheralFile> files)
      Recursive method used to scan this device for potential evidence files, in the form of valid jpeg or png images.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Device

        public Device(java.io.File file)
        Constructs an object representing an external device detected by this program.
        Parameters:
        file - The File object representing this peripheral device
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the parameter is null

    • Method Detail

      • getFiles

        public java.util.ArrayList<PeripheralFile> getFiles()
        Returns an ArrayList of PeripheralFile objects representing all of the potential evidence files detected on this device.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of PeripheralFile objects representing all of the potential evidence files detected on this device

      • retrieveFiles

        private java.util.ArrayList<PeripheralFile> retrieveFiles(java.io.File directory,
                                                java.util.ArrayList<PeripheralFile> files)
        Recursive method used to scan this device for potential evidence files, in the form of valid jpeg or png images.
        Parameters:
        directory - the directory within the device that is currently being scanned
        files - ArrayList of PeripheralFile objects representing all of the evidence files detected thus far
        Returns:
        the same ArrayList that was passed in, plus any additional files detected within the passed in directory
